column1: Table 4-94:  Emissions of HFCs and PFCs from ODS Substitutes (MMT CO2 Eq.)

column2: + Does not exceed 0.05 MMT CO2 Eq.

a Others include HFC-152a, HFC-227ea, HFC-245fa, HFC-43-10mee, HFO-1234yf, C4F10, and PFC/PFPEs, the latter being a proxy for a diverse collection of PFCs and perfluoropolyethers (PFPEs) employed for solvent applications.  For estimating purposes, the GWP value used for PFC/PFPEs was based upon C6F14.
Note: Totals may not sum due to independent rounding.
